item.title: Using UnoCSS in Hugo
item.description: This website uses the Hugo static site generator and UnoCSS for CSS. Below is a record of how to use UnoCSS in Hugo. Modifying the Theme File’s CSS Styles {{- $cssbundle := resources.Match "css/*.css" | resources.Concat "css/main.css" -}} {{- if hugo.IsProduction }} {{ $cssbundle = $cssbundle | minify | fingerprint }} {{ end -}} <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ $cssbundle.RelPermalink }}" {{ if hugo.IsProduction }} integrity="{{ $cssbundle.Data.Integrity }}" {{ end }} /> Note: This code will retrieve all CSS files from your assets/css folder.
